amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate that the Federal Emergency Management Agency should immediately address issues relating to no-bid contracting.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2605 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2605 proposed by Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S13090-13092, S13124; text: CR S13090) Expressing the sense of the Senate that the Federal Emergency Management Agency should immediately address issues relating to no-bid contracting.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2605 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2605 proposed by Senator Obama.
